goals__remit: To assist our clients in understanding EU policy and legislation and to develop action programmes that deal with it effectively. We also assist clients in developing communications strategy and programmes, both internal and external, in relation to EU affairs. This includes communications aimed at the EU institutions intended to inform EU decision-making.
